body:
Installing libemos@4.5.1 and 4.5.9 as well

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install libemos@4.5.1
...
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.0-225-78fee80e4
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel8-skylake_avx512
* **Concretizer:** original

### Additional information

* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5689628/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5689629/spack-build-env.txt)

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: libemos
